section:
One of the nomads, presumably the leader of the warband, tosses his horse's reins to another and comes striding up to you. He pokes you in the chest, seizes you by the back of the neck, presses his face nose-to-nose with yours, and says: 'Fineitri.'
Wrestle him to the ground Say 'Fineitri' back at him Attack him and his men Break away and run
